Description: Arabic inscription, Islamic inscription in field, Islamic inscription in margin, within plain circle (obverse)
Arabic inscription, Quranic inscription in field with large oval pellet below, legend in margin indicating date struck, within a plain circle. (reverse)
Bibliographic references: BMC Oriental (Arab-Byzantine) / A catalogue of the Arab-Byzantine and post-reform Umaiyad coins (203, p.88)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Hon Sir Charles Augustus Murray
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Isma'il Pasha, Viceroy of Egypt
